name: Calmed by the Dark Neon
description:
Set in 2046, you play as Tommy Hunter, who works hunting monsters and dealing with problems in the city, his biggest battle is waiting for him! 

Calmed by the Dark Neon is an open-World action-rpg, where you do missions usually related to hunting monsters. Combat consist of using a sword for melee attacks and dual-pistols for range attack, it is also possible to dodge enemy attacks by using dash.

  • Master your melee and ranged attacks, time your dash and win;
  • Use the bike to complete more missions;
  • Open World;

System Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Core i3 or better
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 700 Mb
  • DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better

Calmed by the Dark Neon

Game developed in RPG Maker MV.
